meanings.sent1: The luminiferous stars shone brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with a luminiferous glow from the lamp.
meanings.sent3: The luminiferous fireflies danced around the garden, lighting up the night.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a luminiferous beacon in the darkness of his thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The luminiferous moon cast a gentle light over the sleeping town.

meanings.definition: Relating to the transmission of light
meanings.sent1: The luminiferous fiber optic cables carried data at high speeds.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the luminiferous properties of the new material.
meanings.sent3: The luminiferous mirror reflected the sunlight in a dazzling display.
meanings.sent4: His words were a luminiferous pathway to understanding the complex theory.
meanings.sent5: The luminiferous prism separated the light into its colorful components.
